description: This file provides a data service module for a mechanic request management system, supporting both local storage and Supabase backend interactions. It includes functions for user authentication, request creation, assignment, status updates, profile management, and utility functions for handling vehicle and contact data normalization.

methods.name: createRequest
methods.description: Creates a new mechanic request, either in local storage or via Supabase, initializing request data and handling insertion.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user via Supabase or local storage, returning user info including role and profile.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user, clearing session data.

methods.name: getCurrentUser
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user information from Supabase or local storage.

methods.name: listUnassignedRequests
methods.description: Lists all requests that are unassigned, from Supabase or local storage.

methods.name: listMyAssignments
methods.description: Lists requests assigned to a specific mechanic, using Supabase join or local storage filtering.

methods.name: getRequestById
methods.description: Fetches a specific request by ID from Supabase or local storage.

methods.name: acceptRequest
methods.description: Assigns a request to a mechanic, updating assignment and request status in Supabase or local storage.

methods.name: updateRequestStatus
methods.description: Updates the status of a request, appending a note, in Supabase or local storage.

methods.name: updateProfile
methods.description: Updates a user's profile information in Supabase or local storage.

methods.name: isSupabaseConfigured
methods.description: Checks if the necessary environment variables for Supabase are set.
